_instructions: 3. The package script will automatically generate the full manifest.json
4. Version should follow semantic versioning: MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH

_osVersionNotes: min: Minimum BrightSign OS version required
target: OS version the extension was developed/tested against
max: Maximum OS version (optional, omit for no upper limit)

_requirementsNotes: memory: RAM requirements for the extension
storage: Disk space needed for installation and runtime data

_runtimeNotes: autoStart: Whether extension starts automatically on boot
startupDelay: Seconds to wait before starting (0-60)

configurable.description: Comma-separated list of classes to detect (empty for all)
Disable automatic startup of the extension

_registryNotes: Define user-configurable settings accessible via BrightSign registry
Registry keys will be prefixed with 'bsext-obj-' automatically

_updateNotes: policy: automatic (allow auto-updates), manual (require approval), blocked (prevent updates)
backupPrevious: Create backup of previous version before updating
preserveConfig: Preserve user configuration during updates
rollbackSupported: Extension supports rollback to previous version
minVersionForUpdate: Minimum current version required to update to this version
maxVersionGap: Maximum version gap allowed for direct updates
requiresReboot: Extension update requires system reboot
